class SourceToRawLoggingTable_MakeParquetAndTable(unittest.TestCase):
    ''' 
    unit tests and feature tests to test the functions contained within py_0_source_to_raw_hr_functions
    test_create_parquet +
    test_create_table +
    potentialjsontest
    
    '''
    def setUp(self):
        target_container = "abfss://odw-raw@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/"
        target_folder = "config/datalabs_log_test/"
        from notebookutils import mssparkutils
        mssparkutils.fs.mkdirs(target_container+target_folder)

    def test_create_parquet_and_table(self):
        '''Create parquet file log table if the table does not already exist '''
        from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
        spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
        from notebookutils import mssparkutils
        from delta import DeltaTable

        schema_table = """{"fields": [{"metadata": {},"name": "Process_Date","nullable": false,"type": "timestamp"}, {"metadata": {},"name": "Filepath","nullable":false,"type": "string"},{"metadata": {},"name": "File_Modified_Date","nullable": false,"type": "string"}]}"""
        jsonschema = schema_table
        db_name =  "odw_test_db"
        table_name = "datalabs_log"
        target_container = "abfss://odw-raw@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/"
        target_folder = "config/datalabs_log_test/"

        
        create_table_from_schema(jsonschema, db_name, table_name, target_container, target_folder)
        self.assertTrue(DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark,target_container+target_folder))
        self.assertTrue(any([table.name == table_name for table in spark.catalog.listTables(db_name)]))

    def tearDown(self):
        target_container = "abfss://odw-raw@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/"
        target_folder = "config/datalabs_log_test/"
        mssparkutils.fs.rm(target_container+target_folder, recurse=True)
        spark.sql("DROP TABLE IF EXISTS odw_test_db.datalabs_log")

class SourceToRawLoggingTable_Errors(unittest.TestCase):
    ''' 
    unit tests and feature tests to test the functions contained within py_0_source_to_raw_hr_functions
    test_existing_table -
    test_exsting_parquet - 
    othern error that gets thrown -
    potentialjsontest
    
    '''
    def setUp(self):
        from notebookutils import mssparkutils
        target_container = "abfss://odw-raw@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/"
        target_folder_1 = "config/datalabs_log_test_1/"
        mssparkutils.fs.mkdirs(target_container+target_folder_1)

        target_folder_2 = "config/datalabs_log_test_2/"
        mssparkutils.fs.mkdirs(target_container+target_folder_2)

    def test_parquet_location_error(self):
        '''Error if a different parquet location is provided for the same table '''
        from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
        spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
        from delta import DeltaTable

        schema_table = """{"fields": [{"metadata": {},"name": "Process_Date","nullable": false,"type": "timestamp"}, {"metadata": {},"name": "Filepath","nullable":false,"type": "string"},{"metadata": {},"name": "File_Modified_Date","nullable": false,"type": "string"}]}"""
        jsonschema = schema_table
        db_name =  "odw_test_db"
        table_name = "datalabs_log"
        target_container = "abfss://odw-raw@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/"
        target_folder_1 = "config/datalabs_log_test_1/"
        create_table_from_schema(jsonschema, db_name, table_name, target_container, target_folder_1)
        
        target_folder_2 = "config/datalabs_log_test_2/"
        with self.assertRaises(ValueError) as context:
            create_table_from_schema(jsonschema, db_name, table_name, target_container, target_folder_2)
        print("hello world")
        self.assertTrue(str(context.exception), f"Table already exists but the location provided doesn't match the existing parquet location for the table!, {target_container+target_folder_1}, {target_container+target_folder_2}")

    def tearDown(self):
        target_container = "abfss://odw-raw@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/"
        target_folder_1 = "config/datalabs_log_test_1/"
        target_folder_2 = "config/datalabs_log_test_2/"
        mssparkutils.fs.rm(target_container+target_folder_1, recurse=True)
        mssparkutils.fs.rm(target_container+target_folder_2, recurse=True)
        spark.sql("DROP TABLE IF EXISTS odw_test_db.datalabs_log")
